B_mode_image_creation module¶

B_mode_image_creation.array_filtering(rfdata_bars)¶
Run envelope detection on individual beams using a
lowess filter of a 2D numpy array of RF data
Parameters:rfdata_bars – 2D array of RF data of size
Returns:RF_array_filtered: 2D numpy array of data that has undergone envelope detection
B_mode_image_creation.equalization(log_RFarray_filtered)¶
“Run histogram equalization on a 2D array of RF data
that has undergone

envelope detection and logarithmic compression

Parameters:log_RFarray_filtered – 2D numpy array of data that has undergone logarithmic compression and envelope detection
Returns:B_mode_array: completed 2D numpy array of B-mode data that has undergone all image processing
B_mode_image_creation.logarithmic_compression(RF_array_filtered)¶

Run logarithmic compression on a 2D numpy array of RF data

Parameters:RF_array_filtered – 2D numpy array of data that has undergone envelope detection
Returns:log_RFarray_filtered: 2D numpy array of data that has

undergone logarithmic compression and envelope detection
